name: Osama Bin Tahir
position: Co-Founder @ Embarc | Entrepreneur | Amazon Brand Optimization
about: Enabling industry leaders in Pakistan to sell globally via online channels including Amazon and eBay - increasing their profits and sales volume by entering new markets and regions.

current_company.name: Embarc: Amazon Advertising SPN Partner
current_company.title: Co-Founder @ Embarc | Entrepreneur | Amazon Brand Optimization

experience.title: Director Global Operations
experience.description: Responsible for planing, directing, and coordinating the operations of organizations with multiple branches across the globe. - Formulating policies and budgets- Managing opportunities and challenges in a manner that maximizes return to the organization- Planning the use of materials and human resources- Developing long-term approaches that redefine problems/opportunities in anticipation of changing business conditions- Leading cross-functional teams as inter-company projects

experience.title: Outreach Manager
experience.description: The center idea of Momentum is to support the startup ecosystem and help startups to get all required resources for success.  I play my role in this initiative by providing assistance in formation of collaborations with academia and incubation centers throughout Pakistan, to be a part of the biggest tech startup conference.

experience.title: Coordinator BBA Entrepreneurship
experience.description: My role was to facilitate all the Entrepreneurship students with the Entrepreneurship Electives and Shadow an Entrepreneur/Experiential Learning Program (ELP) during their four years academic program at IBA.

experience.title: Retail Management Intern
experience.description: I  worked in MeatOne for 10 weeks as an Intern on the projects for their fiscal year 2015-2016 which included BTL activity ‘Meat on Wheels’ project, Instore Design Planogram and Shifting from live butchery to  prepacked SKUs. (grab & go model)

education.title: Bangkok University
education.description: I attended a summer university in Thailand with 126 international students from all over the world. The course was focused on hands on Entrepreneurship in Asia. It taught me a way to deal with people from different backgrounds and countries. I got a chance to represent Pakistan among 126 students who came from 16 countries. I was able to promote a light and soft image of my Pakistan.

recommendations: Omar Abedin “I met Osama when we were enrolled in an MBA program together. He is a smart entrepreneur who runs a growing Amazon business, and I love interacting with, and learning from, this very intelligent young man. Watch him go places, because he is already on the way!”

Umer Rizwan “Working with Osama was a wonderful experience, he is committed, hardworking, and more importantly thinks out of the box. His mind is always at work to find a better way to do things, which always makes things easier in the longer run. I wish him best of luck for his future endeavours and wish that whatever he sets his mind on turns to massive success like his past projects. ”

volunteer_experience.info: It was a life changing experience to spent time with the extra ordinary students of less privileged areas and to create a motivation to study in them.

volunteer_experience.info: I volunteered in a summer school as a teacher which was organized by IBA for the students of Secondary classes  from less privileged areas who joined IBA in their summer vacations to spend time in world class educational environment.

volunteer_experience.title: Entrepreneurship Teacher
